Title: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sport
Writer: Joseph Barbera (story), Bill Kopp (screenplay), William Hanna (characters), Joseph Barbera (characters), Kent Osborne
Actors: Charlie Adler, Jeff Bennett, John DiMaggio, Jess Harnell
Plot: After wrecking their house during a chase, Tom and Jerry enter a race around the world where the winner gets a new fancy house.
